name: Stalker: Lost
description:
Description:

This game is based on the original series of games "S.T.A.L.K.E.R." .
The game is performed in the atmosphere of the Russian "Zone". Music, sounds, atmosphere - it all helps you to immerse yourself in the game. The plot of the game is simple and fascinating. The duration of the game at the moment is 30-60 minutes.
Good luck in the game :)
